summary.span: 使 .NET Framework 資料提供者 (Data Provider) 可以確保使用者具有足夠的安全性等級來存取資料。

span.span: Enables a .NET Framework data provider to help ensure that a user has a security level adequate for accessing data.

span.span: Indicates whether a blank password is allowed.

summary.span: 使用指定的 值及指出是否允許空白密碼的值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a class with the specified value, and a value indicating whether a blank password is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉型別會優先於屬性。The enumeration takes precedence over the property. 因此，如果您設定要`false`，您也必須設定到`None`以防止使用者進行連接，使用空白密碼。Therefore, if you set to `false`, you must also set to `None` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

One of the properties.

summary.span: 將指定之連接字串 (Connection String) 的存取加入現有的 狀態。

span.span: Adds access for the specified connection string to the existing state of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作時，此方法就很有用：This method can be useful when implementing: - .NET framework 資料提供者。A .NET framework data provider. - 資料存取權限必須判斷提示 API。An API that must assert for data access permission. - 系統管理工具或安裝程式，必須修改安全性原則。An administrative tool or installation program that must modify security policy. - 當指定多個規則時，會選取更嚴格的規則。When more than one rule is specified, the more restrictive rule is selected.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

value.span: 如果允許空白密碼則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a blank password is allowed, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉型別會優先於屬性。The enumeration takes precedence over the property. 因此，如果您設定要`false`，您也必須設定到`None`以防止使用者進行連接，使用空白密碼。Therefore, if you set to `false`, you must also set to `None` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前使用權限物件的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
A copy of the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權限物件的複本會表示資源與原始的使用權限物件相同的存取權。A copy of a permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.

param.name: securityElement
param.span: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

span.span: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.

summary.span: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

span.span: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作`ToXml`和`FromXml`的方法，讓物件安全性 encodable。Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the `ToXml` and `FromXml` methods to make the objects security encodable.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 與目前使用權限物件交集的使用權限物件。

span.span: A permission object to intersect with the current permission object.

param.span: 它必須與目前的使用權限物件為相同的型別。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 傳回代表目前使用權限物件和指定使用權限物件之交集的新使用權限物件。

span.span: Returns a new permission object representing the intersection of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

returns.span: 表示目前使用權限物件和指定使用權限物件交集的新使用權限物件。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，則這個新的使用權限物件是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: This new permission object is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

exception.span: 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )，而且不是和目前使用權限物件相同類別的執行個體。

span.span: The parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission object.
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 將測試子集關聯性 (Relationship) 的使用權限物件。

span.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個物件必須與目前的使用權限物件為相同的型別。

span.span: This object must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 傳回值，指出目前的使用權限物件是否為指定使用權限物件的子集。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限物件是指定之使用權限物件的子集則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限物件指定一組完全包含在指定的權限物件的作業，目前的使用權限物件是指定之權限物件的子集。The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是 c： 表示存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的使用權限物件，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定使用權限物件。If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object.

exception.span: 參數是一個物件，沒有與目前使用權限物件相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is an object that is not of the same type as the current permission object.
ADO.NET Overview

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the permission can be represented as unrestricted without any knowledge of the permission semantics.

returns.span: 如果使用權限可以表示為不受限制，則為 。

span.span: if the permission can be represented as unrestricted.

summary.span: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.

returns.span: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

span.span: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作和的方法，讓物件安全性 encodable。Custom code that extends security objects must implement the and methods to make the objects security encodable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission other) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (other As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 與目前使用權限物件結合的使用權限物件。

span.span: A permission object to combine with the current permission object.

param.span: 它必須與目前的使用權限物件為相同的型別。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 傳回新的使用權限物件，這個物件是目前和指定使用權限物件的聯集。

span.span: Returns a new permission object that is the union of the current and specified permission objects.

returns.span: 新使用權限物件，表示目前使用權限物件和指定使用權限物件的聯集。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果代表所有作業的權限的允許目前的使用權限物件和指定使用權限物件。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations permitted by both the current permission object and the specified permission object. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 物件與目前使用權限物件的型別不同。

span.span: The object is not the same type as the current permission object.
ADO.NET Overview
